title: Banned after a single game??
body:

replies.body: You just got a chat-restriction 6 days ago, and another not long before that. Since you are showing a pattern here, the penalty was escalated. As noted in your reform card the next escalation will be to a perma-ban.
Basically since he received enough penalties in a short enough time frame to skip a stage.  Right?

> You just got a chat-restriction 6 days ago, and another not long before that.

That's 2 CRs.   One 10-cr, one 25-cr (6 days ago).  This one is 14-day based on the punishment ladder.  No stage was skipped.  A skip would be perma-banned for this log.

welcome back dad {{summoner:11}}

very confused at the downvotes what

I should add to OP that after a 2-weeks ban even the slightest misbehavior can lead up to a punishment, being a permaban this time;

>sharkboyQC: that doesnt o%%%% as leashing

You typed the C-word, which got you a 2-week ban.

You may be able to reduce it down to a chat restriction if you contact support.
Your behavior however was unacceptable in the chat log you provided, and you will eventually be permabanned if you do not take this punishment seriously.
Riot does not lift permabans under any circumstance, which is the punishment after a 2 week ban. 
Regardless if support can help you, this should be a huge cause for concern.

Nope. You're wrong.
You can get penalized for verbal abuse to your enemies. 
Everything you've said is against the ToU.  In the ToU verbal abuse is not permitted in League of Legends in general. Doesn't matter if it's to your team or to the enemy. 

As Tantram said, you weren't banned for one game, you were banned for being consistently toxic during your duration of using Riot's service.
He's gotten multiple punishments in short order so he was escalated.
